ai-iti79:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti79:2.1_0: “These three things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-iti79:2.3_0: It’s when a mendicant relishes work,
ai-iti79:2.4_0: They enjoy talk, talk, sleep, and company.
ai-iti79:2.5_0: They relish, talk, sleep, and company.
ai-iti79:2.6_0: These three things lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-iti79:3.1_0: These three things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.
ai-iti79:3.3_0: It’s when a mendicant doesn’t relish work,
ai-iti79:3.4_0: They don’t enjoy talk, talk, sleep, and company.
ai-iti79:3.5_0: They don’t relish work, talk, sleep, and company.
ai-iti79:3.6_0: These three things don’t lead to the decline of a mendicant trainee.”
ai-iti79:3.7_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti79:5.1_0: That’s why absorption is fewer of wishes
ai-iti79:6.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti79:6.3_0: The third sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
ai-iti79:7.1_0: It’s seen the escape from two forms,
